list.abs: apian mom says : " Do not carry that again thin cling to cling to foreman , carrying all the day run around here and there to do not have even station wagon . "蜜蜂妈妈说：“别再提那瘦巴巴的工头，整天扛着东奔西跑连台货车都没有。”

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Latin apianus, from apis 'bee'

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or having the characteristics of bees
